ui.hero_heading: Regulation-ready commercial vehicles from dossier strategy to SOP.
ui.hero_lead: I align homologation evidence, brake-by-wire integration, and wheel-end industrialization so multi-brand platforms launch on time and fully compliant.
ui.hero_availability: Available for interviews — based in Tunis, partnering globally.
ui.hero_point_1: ProAce City / Rifter / Combo WVTA lead — RCE annexes, markings, CoP governance.
ui.hero_point_2: Euro 7 brake-by-wire alignment — Continental MK C2, Bosch ESP10, particulate compliance.
ui.hero_point_3: Renault Master Gen3 hub & axle launch — supplier readiness, torque/runout assurance.
ui.hero_panel_item_1: Homologation leadership: WVTA, RCE, UN-ECE annexes, markings, CoP.
ui.hero_panel_item_2: Euro 7 braking delivery: particulate compliance, redundancy, diagnostics.
ui.hero_panel_item_3: Chassis robustness: Axles, wheel-end, torque/runout, supplier readiness.
ui.hero_panel_item_4: Program governance: Multi-brand orchestration, KPI dashboards, risk control.
ui.expertise_intro: Integrated engineering leadership covering regulation intelligence, braking systems, and launch-quality chassis execution.
ui.expertise_homologation_body: WVTA dossiers for multi-brand platforms; annex evidence, DoC tracking, VIN/markings, CoP alignment.
ui.expertise_braking_body: Brake-by-wire integration, particulate compliance, redundancy, and thermal robustness for LCV duty cycles.
ui.expertise_braking_point_1: Continental MK C2 / Bosch ESP10 harmonization
ui.expertise_chassis_body: Axles, hub-bearing units, torque and runout stability, supplier ramp-up and EOL conformity.
ui.expertise_program_body: Cross-functional orchestration, clear KPI governance, and risk mitigation from concept to SOP.
ui.expertise_program_point_1: Stakeholder cadence across engineering, quality, suppliers
ui.methods_intro: A structured delivery loop keeps regulatory, technical, and supply-chain tracks aligned.
ui.methods_step_1_body: Clarify vehicle scope, region-specific annexes, and homologation perimeter; map evidence gaps and owners.
ui.methods_step_2_body: Align braking/chassis architecture, ensure redundancy & diagnostics, and define validation envelopes.
ui.methods_step_3_body: Secure supplier readiness, run PPAP/CoP sign-off, and land the dossier with authorities on schedule.
ui.experience_intro: Highlights across OEM and supplier programs covering light commercial and passenger platforms.
ui.experience_item_1_body: Coordinated WVTA streams for Toyota ProAce City, Peugeot Rifter, Citroën Berlingo, and Opel Combo derivatives.
ui.experience_item_2_body: Led MK C2 brake-by-wire and ESP10 integration reviews, aligning particulate strategy, redundancy, and validation campaigns.
ui.experience_item_3_body: Drove axle and hub-bearing industrialization; secured torque/runout tolerances and supplier QCDP readiness for launch.
ui.toolkit_intro: Blending OEM toolchains, regulatory standards, and collaborative platforms.
ui.contact_intro: Share your homologation, braking, or chassis brief — I will map the delivery path, evidence, and stakeholders.
ui.contact_availability: Available for interviews and rapid engagements — reply within 24 hours.
ui.footer_note: Built for clarity, compliance, and launch-readiness.
ui.projects_ssr_proace_summary: Recovered Toyota dossier milestones with complete annex packs, VIN schema alignment, and authority briefings.
ui.projects_ssr_proace_point_1: EC WVTA annex evidence assembled without rework.
ui.projects_ssr_proace_point_2: VIN labelling, markings, and CoP routines synchronised.
ui.projects_ssr_mkc2_summary: Brought Continental MK C2 and Bosch ESP10 systems into a common validation plan with particulate compliance on track.
ui.projects_ssr_mkc2_point_1: Joint calibration roadmap covering redundancy envelopes.
ui.projects_ssr_mkc2_point_2: Diagnostics and service readiness kit delivered with SOP.
ui.projects_ssr_renault_summary: Led hub and axle launch governance, sustaining zero launch-blocking findings across audits.
ui.projects_ssr_renault_point_1: Torque/runout analytics embedded into digital quality wall.
ui.projects_ssr_renault_point_2: Supplier war room cut defect recurrence by 75%.
